entities.name: Campaign
entities.description: Container for campaign activities and responses, sales literature, products, and lists to create, plan, execute, and track the results of a specific marketing campaign through its life.

attributes.name: campaignId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the campaign.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the record was created.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: ownerId
attributes.description: Owner Id

attributes.name: owningBusinessUnit
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the business unit that owns the record

attributes.name: owningUser
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the user that owns the record.

attributes.name: owningTeam
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the team that owns the record.

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Version Number

attributes.name: emailAddress
attributes.description: The primary email address for the entity.

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Type a name for the campaign so that it is identified correctly in lists.

attributes.name: processId
attributes.description: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

attributes.name: stageId
attributes.description: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

attributes.name: traversedPath
attributes.description: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

attributes.name: actualEnd
attributes.description: Enter the date when the campaign was closed or completed.

attributes.name: actualStart
attributes.description: Enter the actual start date and time for the campaign.

attributes.name: budgetedCost
attributes.description: Type the amount budgeted for the campaign to define a limit for how much you can spend.

attributes.name: transactionCurrencyId
attributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

attributes.name: exchangeRate
attributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

attributes.name: budgetedCostBase
attributes.description: Value of the Budget Allocated in base currency.

attributes.name: codeName
attributes.description: Type a number or other tracking code to identify the campaign. If no value is entered, a code will be generated automatically.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type additional information to describe the campaign, such as the products or services offered or the targeted audience.

attributes.name: expectedResponse
attributes.description: Type the expected response rate for the campaign as a full number between 0 and 100.

attributes.name: expectedRevenue
attributes.description: Type the expected revenue for the campaign for return on investment projections and post-campaign reporting.

attributes.name: expectedRevenueBase
attributes.description: Value of the Estimated Revenue in base currency.

attributes.name: isTemplate
attributes.description: Select whether the campaign is a template that can be copied when you create future campaigns.

attributes.name: message
attributes.description: Type the promotional message or marketing copy for the campaign.

attributes.name: objective
attributes.description: Type the objective of the campaign, including products, services, discounts, and pricing.

attributes.name: otherCost
attributes.description: Type the sum of any miscellaneous campaign costs not included in the campaign activities to make sure the actual cost of the campaign is calculated correctly.

attributes.name: otherCostBase
attributes.description: Value of the Miscellaneous Costs in base currency.

attributes.name: promotionCodeName
attributes.description: Type a promotional code to track sales related to the campaign or allow customers to redeem a discount offer.

attributes.name: proposedEnd
attributes.description: Enter the date when the campaign is scheduled to end.

attributes.name: proposedStart
attributes.description: Enter the date when the campaign is scheduled to start.

attributes.name: stateCode
attributes.description: Shows the status of the campaign. By default, campaigns are active and can't be deactivated.

attributes.name: statusCode
attributes.description: Select the campaign's status.

attributes.name: totalActualCost
attributes.description: Shows the sum of the amounts entered in the Total Cost of Campaign Activities and Miscellaneous Costs fields.

attributes.name: totalActualCostBase
attributes.description: Value of the Total Cost of Campaign in base currency.

attributes.name: totalCampaignActivityActualCost
attributes.description: Shows the sum of the values entered in the Actual Cost field on all campaign activities related to the campaign.

attributes.name: totalCampaignActivityActualCostBase
attributes.description: Value of the Total Cost of Campaign Activities in base currency.

attributes.name: typeCode
attributes.description: Select the type of the campaign.

attributes.name: priceListId
attributes.description: Choose the price list associated with this item to make sure the products associated with the campaign are offered at the correct prices.
